HOME.TITLE: Profile
HOME.CONTENT: By the order of Jedi Council, many people have started travelling across the galaxies. Although the Sith Lord and Vader have been defeated their followers are still at large. The Jedi Order has launched this website, so that you may know your Star Ships well and prepare yourself for long journey and avoid unnecessary stops. Use the Star Ship Tab to calculate how many stops for resupply are required for a given distance.
HOME.CONTENT_2: May The Force Be With You !!
HOME.calculator_value: Enter the distance you want to travel & Hit Enter
